name: Coin Box
description:
Touch the coin box for will be rich! And create your ultimate guild.
You need a lot of money to defend the town from the zombies.
Let Collect money to buy weapons and to grow your animals.
grow your character more powerful for challenge collect rare items from deep dungeon.
A variety of classes and eight characters, dozens of different kinds of special skills are waiting for you.

※ How to play
1. Touch the coin box. again again again..
2. Buy the weapons.
3. Grow the animals.
4. Enter the dungeons.
5. Becomes stronger.
6. Defend the town from zombies.
